name: The Facility (itch) (Or1beau)
description:
So it's a 2d platformer (basic I know, I wanted to keep it simple this time around!) wherein the Rewind mechanic comes into play whenever you are falling. Basically, if you are falling too fast, you'll trigger a Rewind and you'll be rewound back to the last frame you were on the ground. Objects around the environment are rewinded aswell!
